foreignData.name: Gedeihende Grubblinge
foreignData.text:
Wenn die Gedeihenden Grubblinge ins Spiel kommen, erhältst du {E}{E} (zwei Energiemarken).
Immer wenn die Gedeihenden Grubblinge angreifen, kannst du {E}{E} bezahlen. Falls du dies tust, lege eine +1/+1-Marke auf sie.

foreignData.name: Vermilinguos impetuosos
foreignData.text:
Cuando los Vermilinguos impetuosos entren al campo de batalla, obtienes {E}{E} (dos contadores de energía).
Siempre que los Vermilinguos impetuosos ataquen, puedes pagar {E}{E}. Si lo haces, pon un contador +1/+1 sobre ellos.

foreignData.name: Larves prospères
foreignData.text:
Quand les Larves prospères arrivent sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez {E}{E} (deux marqueurs « énergie »).
À chaque fois que les Larves prospères attaquent, vous pouvez payer {E}{E}. Si vous faites ainsi, mettez un marqueur +1/+1 sur elles.

foreignData.flavorText: Alcuni passeggeri non pagano il biglietto.
foreignData.name: Larve Vigorose
foreignData.text:
Quando le Larve Vigorose entrano nel campo di battaglia, ottieni {E}{E} (due segnalini energia).
Ogniqualvolta le Larve Vigorose attaccano, puoi pagare {E}{E}. Se lo fai, metti un segnalino +1/+1 su di esse.

foreignData.flavorText: 切符を買った乗客ばかりではない。
foreignData.name: 亢進する地虫
foreignData.text:
亢進する地虫が戦場に出たとき、あなたは{E}{E}（エネルギー・カウンター２個）を得る。
亢進する地虫が攻撃するたび、あなたは{E}{E}を支払ってもよい。そうしたなら、これの上に＋１/＋１カウンターを１個置く。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — グレムリン

foreignData.name: 원기왕성한 유충
foreignData.text:
원기왕성한 유충이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 {E}{E}(에너지 카운터 두 개)를 얻는다.
원기왕성한 유충이 공격할 때마다, 당신은 {E}{E}를 지불할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 원기왕성한 유충에 +1/+1 카운터 한 개를 올려놓는다.

foreignData.name: Larvas Vigorosas
foreignData.text:
Quando Larvas Vigorosas entra no campo de batalha, você recebe {E}{E} (dois marcadores de energia).
Toda vez que Larvas Vigorosas ataca, você pode pagar {E}{E}. Se fizer isso, coloque um marcador +1/+1 nela.

foreignData.name: Здоровые Толстопузы
foreignData.text:
Когда Здоровые Толстопузы выходят на поле битвы, вы получаете {E}{E} (два жетона энергии).
Каждый раз, когда Здоровые Толстопузы атакуют, вы можете заплатить {E}{E}. Если вы это делаете, положите на них один жетон +1/+1.

foreignData.name: 强旺幼灵
foreignData.text:
当强旺幼灵进战场时，你得到{E}{E}（两个能量指示物）。
每当强旺幼灵攻击时，你可以支付{E}{E}。若你如此作，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

foreignData.name: 強旺幼靈
foreignData.text:
當強旺幼靈進戰場時，你得到{E}{E}（兩個能量指示物）。
每當強旺幼靈攻擊時，你可以支付{E}{E}。若你如此作，則在其上放置一個+1/+1指示物。

name: Thriving Grubs
originalText:
When Thriving Grubs enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Grubs attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.

rulings.text: {E} is the energy symbol. It represents one energy counter.
Energy counters are a kind of counter that a player may have. They're not associated with specific permanents. (Other kinds of counters that players may have include poison and experience.)
Keep careful track of how many energy counters each player has. You may do so by keeping a running count on paper, by using a die, or by any other clear and mutually agreeable method.

If an effect says you get one or more {E}, you get that many energy counters. To pay one or more {E}, you lose that many energy counters. Any effects that interact with counters a player gets, has, or loses can interact with energy counters.
Energy counters aren't mana. They don't go away as steps, phases, and turns end, and effects that add mana “of any type” to your mana pool can't give you energy counters.
You can't pay more energy counters than you have.

Some triggered abilities state that you “may pay” a certain amount of {E}. You can't pay that amount multiple times to multiply the effect. You simply choose whether or not to pay that amount of {E} as the ability resolves, and no player may take actions to try to stop the ability's effect after you make your choice.

text:
When Thriving Grubs enters the battlefield, you get {E}{E} (two energy counters).
Whenever Thriving Grubs attacks, you may pay {E}{E}. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on it.
